root.message: The RATIONALE field for indicator 1-1-1, translated into en
root.data: Multidimensional poverty measurement to build a complete and comprehensive picture of poverty in Vietnam: Including income and lack of basic social services: Health; education; House; clean water and sanitation; information. To serve as a basis for policy making and economic development planning in order to improve people's living standards, reduce poverty, and increase access to social services. In addition, this indicator is used to compare with multidimensional poverty rates of countries in the region and the world.
